text: Marlton is an unincorporated community and census-designated place (CDP) located within Evesham Township, in Burlington County, New Jersey, United States.GCT-PH1 - Population, Housing Units, Area, and Density: 2010 - County -- County Subdivision and Place from the 2010 Census Summary File 1 for Burlington County, New Jersey , United States Census Bureau. Accessed June 16, 2013.2006-2010 American Community Survey Geography for New Jersey, United States Census Bureau. Accessed June 16, 2013.New Jersey: 2010 - Population and Housing Unit Counts - 2010 Census of Population and Housing (CPH-2-32), United States Census Bureau, p. III-3, August 2012. Accessed June 16, 2013. As of the 2020 United States Census, Marlton's population was 10,594. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in New Jersey Category:Census-designated places in New Jersey
title: Marlton, New Jersey
